All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Interface ec.ez.collect.NameTableEditor

public interface NameTableEditor
extends NameTable
The interface by which NameTables can be changed

inherit(NameTable)
'table' is added to the set of NameTables this NameTable inherits from.
introduce(String, Object)
The locals must not already have a binding for 'name'.
localMapping()
A snapshot of the name-to-value mapping of the locals part of this NameTable.
put(String, Object)
There must be a binding for 'name' somewhere in the inheritance chain.
undefine(String)
The locals must contain a binding for 'name'.

introduce 
 public abstract void introduce(String name,
                                Object value) throws AlreadyDefinedException
The locals must not already have a binding for 'name'. A binding from 'name' to 'value' is added to the locals.

put 
 public abstract void put(String name,
                          Object value) throws NotFoundException, AlreadyDefinedException
There must be a binding for 'name' somewhere in the inheritance chain. The first such binding is changed to map to 'value'.

undefine 
 public abstract Object undefine(String name) throws NotFoundException
The locals must contain a binding for 'name'. This binding is removed, and its old value is returned.

localMapping 
 public abstract Mapping localMapping()
A snapshot of the name-to-value mapping of the locals part of this NameTable. Even though this is a query only operation, we put in on NameTableEditor since the distinction between locals & non-locals has no effect on those that only have a NameTable.

inherit 
 public abstract void inherit(NameTable table)
'table' is added to the set of NameTables this NameTable inherits from.
